item.title: About
item.description: echo “Hello World!” I’m Eidolon, I’m a Cyber Security and Ethical Hacking student. This is a work in progress portfolio/blog/time capsule. Hopefully soon to be populated with personal projects, university work, CTF write-ups and general stuff. Hope you enjoy!
item.content:
echo “Hello World!”

I’m Eidolon, I’m a Cyber Security and Ethical Hacking student.

This is a work in progress portfolio/blog/time capsule. Hopefully soon to be populated with personal projects, university work, CTF write-ups and general stuff.

Hope you enjoy!
